ing: 4 small carrots, cut into 2 inch pieces
des: "Pork chops braised in a tomato, potato and carrot sauce/mixture. One skillet, one word: Yummy!"
ins: In a large skillet, brown pork chops over medium heat for about 4 to 6 minutes each side. Pour off fat. Add the tomato soup, water, Worcestershire sauce, salt, potatoes, and carrots. Cover skillet, reduce heat to medium low and let simmer for 45 minutes or until tender.
